title: Sean Dyche: Nottingham Forest boss 'stunned' by 'bizarre' VAR decisions in Man City defeat
description: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche is critical of the officials over some "bizarre" decisions in his side's late 2-1 defeat by Manchester City.
content:
Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche was critical of the officials over some "bizarre" decisions in his side's late 2-1 defeat by Manchester City.

title: South East rail users hit by change to peak time ticketing
description: Conservative MP for Reigate Rebecca Paul says the new rules are "more expensive and confusing".
content:
The expansion of contactless payments on trains has caused the price of travelling on some services to soar as they now require more expensive peak time tickets.
The change allows people to pay by tapping a bank card or contactless-enabled device on ... [2010 chars]

title: PDC World Darts Championship: Jonny Clayton wins to reach fourth round
description: Fifth seed Jonny Clayton wins a deciding set to beat number 44 Niels Zonneveld and reach the last 16 of the PDC World Championship.
content:
Fifth seed Jonny Clayton needed a deciding set to eventually overcome world number 44 Niels Zonneveld and reach the last 16 of the PDC World Championship.

title: Liverpool 2-1 Wolves: Florian Wirtz scores his first goal for club
description: Florian Wirtz scores his first Liverpool goal as they hold out to beat Wolves on an emotional afternoon at Anfield as Diogo Jota is remembered by both sets of fans.
content:
Liverpool have won 16 of their last 17 Premier League games against Wolves, with the exception being a 3-0 loss at Molineux in February 2023.

title: Report: BioShock 4 Brief Glimpse Into the Characters and Setting
